meanings.definition: The belief that a person or animal can be reborn in a new body after death.
meanings.sent1: Many people hold the belief in reincarnations, thinking they will come back in a new body.
meanings.sent2: The concept of reincarnations is central to some religious teachings.
meanings.sent3: The idea of reincarnations can lead to interesting discussions about life after death.
meanings.sent4: In some stories, characters experience multiple reincarnations, each with a different purpose.
meanings.sent5: The notion of reincarnations can bring comfort to those grieving loss.

meanings.definition: A new version or form of something from the past.
meanings.sent1: The artist created modern reincarnations of classic paintings.
meanings.sent2: Technology has brought about many digital reincarnations of old games.
meanings.sent3: Seeing the new reincarnations of old fashion trends can be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The city's skyline is a reincarnation of its former self, now filled with skyscrapers.
meanings.sent5: Each season, fashion designers present fresh reincarnations of past styles.
